name: People-search
tagline: A simple people search, that takes data from Google search results and displays basic information and bio of the person, along with a list of related people who are searched for.
body:
PeopleSearch
=============

A simple people search, that takes data from Google search results and displays basic information and bio of the person, along with a list of related people who are searched for.

``sudo apt-get install xvfb``  
``sudo pip install selenium pyvirtualdisplay``  
``python routes.py``  

Open ``localhost:3167``
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
